sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
  CButton,
  CCard,
  CCardBody,
  CCardFooter,
  CCol,
  CFormGroup,
  CInput,
  CLabel,
  CRow,
  CSelect,
  CTextarea,
} from "@coreui/react";
import CIcon from "@coreui/icons-react";
import * as axios from "axios";

class SupplierForm extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);

    this.state = {
      supplierName: "",
      supplierAddress: "",
      supplierPanNumber: "",
      supplierPhoneNumber: "",
      supplierMobileNumber: "",
      supplierEmail: "",
      supplierWebsiteUrl: ""
    }
  }

  handleInputChange = (e) => {

    const {name, value} = e.target
    this.setState({
      [name]: value
    })

  }

  handleFormSubmit = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()

    let supplier = {
      supplierName: this.state.this.state.supplierId,
      supplierAddress: this.state.supplierAddress,
      supplierPanNumber: this.state.supplierPanNumber,
      supplierPhoneNumber: this.state.supplierPhoneNumber,
      supplierMobileNumber: this.state.supplierMobileNumber,
      supplierEmail: this.state.supplierEmail,
      supplierWebsiteUrl: this.state.supplierWebsiteUrl,
    }

    axios.post('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/supplier', supplier)
      .then(response => {

        let
          supplierSearch = {
            "supplierId": "",
            "supplierName": "",
          }
        let page = 1
        let size = 10
        axios.put('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/supplier/search?page=' + page + "&size=" + size, supplierSearch)
          .then(response => {

            console.log(response.data.responseDTOList)
            const data = response.data.responseDTOList

            this.props.updateSupplier(data)
          })

      })

  }

  render() {
    return (

      <CRow>

        <CCol xs="12" sm="6">
          <CCard>
            <CCardBody>

              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="supplierName">Supplier Name</CLabel>
                <CInput name="supplierName" id="supplierName"
                        value={this.state.supplierName}
                        onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                        placeholder="Enter Supplier Name"
                        required="required"/>
              </CFormGroup>

              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="supplierAddress">Supplier Address</CLabel>
                <CInput name="supplierAddress" id="supplierAddress"
                        value={this.state.supplierAddress}
                        onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                        placeholder="Enter Supplier Address"
                        required="required"/>
              </CFormGroup>

              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="supplierPanNumber">Supplier Pan Number</CLabel>
                <CInput id="supplierPanNumber" name="supplierPanNumber"
                        value={this.state.supplierPanNumber}
                        onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                        placeholder="Enter Supplier Pan Number"/>
              </CFormGroup>

              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="supplierPhoneNumber">Supplier Phone Number</CLabel>
                <CTextarea name="supplierPhoneNumber" id="supplierPhoneNumber"
                           value={this.state.supplierPhoneNumber}
                           onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                           placeholder="Enter Supplier Phone Number"
                           required="required"/>
              </CFormGroup>

              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="supplierMobileNumber">Supplier Mobile Number</CLabel>
                <CTextarea name="supplierMobileNumber" id="supplierMobileNumber"
                           value={this.state.supplierMobileNumber}
                           onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                           placeholder="Enter Supplier Mobile Number"
                           required="required"/>
              </CFormGroup>

              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="supplierEmail">Supplier Email</CLabel>
                <CTextarea name="supplierEmail" id="supplierEmail"
                           value={this.state.supplierEmail}
                           onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                           placeholder="Enter Supplier Email"
                           required="required"/>
              </CFormGroup>


            </CCardBody>

          </CCard>
        </CCol>

        <CCol xs="12" sm="6">
          <CCard>
            <CCardBody>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="costPrice">Cost Price(Rs.)</CLabel>
                <CInput id="costPrice" name="supplierCostPrice"
                        value={this.state.supplierCostPrice}
                        onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                        placeholder="Enter your Cost Price"
                        required="required"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="sellingPrice">Selling Price(Rs.)</CLabel>
                <CInput id="sellingPrice" name="supplierSellingPrice"
                        value={this.state.supplierSellingPrice}
                        onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                        placeholder="Enter Selling Price"
                        required="required"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="supplierDiscountAmount">Discount Amount</CLabel>
                <CInput id="supplierDiscountAmount" name="supplierDiscountAmount"
                        value={this.state.supplierDiscountAmount}
                        onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                        placeholder="Enter Discount Amount"
                        required="required"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup row className="my-0">
                <CCol xs="8">
                  <CFormGroup>
                    <CLabel htmlFor="supplierDiscountPercentage">Discount Percentage(%)</CLabel>
                    <CInput id="supplierDiscountPercentage" name="supplierDiscountPercentage"
                            value={this.state.supplierDiscountPercentage}
                            onChange={this.handleInputChange}
                            placeholder="Enter your city"
                            required="required"/>
                  </CFormGroup>
                </CCol>
              </CFormGroup>

            </CCardBody>
            <CCardFooter>
              <CButton type="submit" onClick={this.handleFormSubmit} size="sm" color="primary"><CIcon
                name="cil-scrubber"/> Submit</CButton>
              <CButton type="reset" size="sm" color="danger"><CIcon name="cil-ban"/> Reset</CButton>
            </CCardFooter>

          </CCard>
        </CCol>

      </CRow>


    )
  }
}

export default SupplierForm
